citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:08 PM on 07-SEP-
2023.
The Inspector arrived at the facility gate and contacted the licensee by phone. The licensee stated she was not at the
facility and would not be available for at least two more hours. The Inspector then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:08 PM on 07-SEP-
2023. 
 
The Inspector arrived at the facility gate and contacted the licensee by phone. The licensee stated she was not at the 
facility and would not be available for at least two more hours. The Inspector then left the premises. 
 
 
End Section
